author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

Still now, wfs running with 2022 conditions, setup and HLT (ok `@relval2022` in this cycle is the fake one, but still) are still labelled as 2021 and I find it a bit odd. This PR proposes a small fix to have them labelled as "2022" wfs.

#### PR validation:

None.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Maybe useful to backport this down to `12_4_X` that is the data taking release for 2022 (@cms-sw/orp-l2 ?). Not really strictly needed though.
title: Rename 2021 with 2022
